page.title: 16A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: I get up about 7.30am,wash,get dressed in my school uniform which is grey shirt,trousers,pullover & green tie; have breakfast of cereal,toast & tea, brush my teeth then go with my sister to Greenhaugh to wait for the minibus. It comes at 8.30 and after we all pile in it sets off for school, picking up others on the way. We have time to play until the bell rings at 9am.When we have said the prayer we do Mental Arithmetic and as this is Wednesday, World News. At 10am. we go in to music until playtime at 10.40. After that we do maths until lunchtime at 12 noon. In the afternoon we have language, art and a chapter of our story before going home on the minibus at 3.30pm. When I get home I go out to play with my friend Jamie until it is time for tea. After tea I sometimes go out again or watch TV before going to bed.
